claim: Thanos has yet to appear in a movie.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Thanos appears in the Marvel Cinematic Universe 's various films , including The Avengers  (  2012  )  , portrayed by Damion Poitier , and Guardians of the Galaxy  (  2014  )  , Avengers : Age of Ultron  (  2015  )  , Avengers : Infinity War  (  2018  )  and its untitled sequel  (  2019  )  , portrayed by Josh Brolin .
